item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

  1. modify server to recognize only the skills you want and modify packets sent from the server to the client
  2. modify client receiving packets relating to skills

Stuff like this:

              for (int skill = 0; skill < 18; ++skill) {
                    this.playerStatCurrent[skill] = this.packetsIncoming.getUnsignedByte();
                }

                for (int skill = 0; skill < 18; ++skill) {
                    this.playerStatBase[skill] = this.packetsIncoming.getUnsignedByte();
                }

                for (int skill = 0; skill < 18; ++skill) {
                    this.playerExperience[skill] = this.packetsIncoming.getUnsignedInt();
                }
  1. update the drawing of the skill interface to only display the skills you want

if you are planning on adding skills in the future it would be wise to modify this in a way where you can easily extend it.

Read full topic
